name: Chickpea Dahl
directions: Dice onions and put in a large pot with half the oil. Sweat till translucent and add grated garlic and ginger, then spices and tomato paste. Cook 2-3 minutes till fragrant. Add the 2 cans of coconut milk and simmer for 10-15 minutes till thick. Turn off the heat, add the cilantro and spinach and let wilt in residual heat.
